<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[30, 15, 702, 60]]<|/det|> # Trigonometrische Funktionen <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 90, 936, 159]]<|/det|> - periodische Funktion: werden genutzt, um periodische Vorgänge zu beschreiben, z.B. Schwingungen <|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[90, 171, 303, 285]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[375, 186, 841, 217]]<|/det|> bzw. \(\alpha\): \(a\): Gegenkante <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[575, 225, 796, 255]]<|/det|> c: Ankathete <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[575, 264, 830, 293]]<|/det|> b: Hypothenuse <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[85, 335, 808, 380]]<|/det|> \[ \sin \alpha = \frac{a}{b} = \cos \gamma \quad \cos \alpha = \frac{c}{b} = \sin \gamma \] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[85, 390, 888, 435]]<|/det|> \[ \tan \alpha = \frac{a}{c} = \frac{\sin \alpha}{\cos \alpha} \quad \cot \alpha = \frac{c}{a} = \frac{\cos \alpha}{\sin \alpha} = \frac{1}{\tan \alpha} \] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[60, 451, 470, 492]]<|/det|> \[ \alpha + \gamma = 90^\circ, \quad \alpha + \gamma = \frac{\pi}{2} \] <|ref|>table<|/ref|><|det|>[[50, 509, 580, 747]]<|/det|>
Grad0°30°45°60°90°
Bogen0\(\frac{\pi}{6}\)\(\frac{\pi}{4}\)\(\frac{\pi}{3}\)\(\frac{\pi}{2}\)
sin0\(\frac{1}{2}\)\(\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{2}\)\(\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{3}\)1
cos1\(\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{3}\)\(\frac{1}{2}\sqrt{2}\)\(\frac{3}{2}\)0
tan0\(\frac{1}{3}\sqrt{3}\)1-\(\sqrt{3}\)/
cot/-\(\sqrt{3}\)1\(\frac{1}{3}\sqrt{3}\)0
<|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[100, 785, 404, 955]]<|/det|> <|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[325, 792, 595, 821]]<|/det|> Einheitskreis: \(r = 1\) <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[404, 849, 620, 880]]<|/det|> \[ P(\cos \alpha, \sin \alpha) \] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[404, 910, 671, 936]]<|/det|> \[ \sin \alpha = \sin(\alpha + 360^\circ) \] <|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[478, 947, 810, 974]]<|/det|> \[ = \sin(\alpha + n \cdot 360^\circ), \quad n \in \mathbb{N} \]
